Sign up with this Google Account: Sign up with this Google Account
Name: Name

notice.restricted_defail: Once the admin approves your sign up, you'll be able to access this wiki.
notice.google_account_continue: Enter your user ID, name and password to continue.

form_help.email: You must have email address which listed below to sign up to this wiki.
form_help.password: Your password must be at least 6 characters long.
form_help.user_id: The URL of pages you create will contain your User ID. Your User ID can consist of letters, numbers, and some symbols.

form_help.profile_image2: Set up AWS or enable local uploads.
form_help.google_connect1: With Google Connect, you can sign in with your Google Account.
form_help.google_connect2: Only Google Apps accounts with the following email addresses are connectable Google accounts:
form_help.google_disconnect1: If you disconnect your Google account, you will be unable to sign in using Google Authentication
form_help.google_disconnect2: After disconnecting your Google account, you can sign in normally using your email and password

notice.update_token1: You can update to generate a new API Token.
notice.update_token2: You will need to update the API Token in any existing processes.

notice.version: This is not the current version.
notice.unlinked: Redirect pages to this page have been deleted.
notice.restricted: Access to this page is restricted

notice.conflict: Couldn't save the changes you made because someone else was editing this page. Please re-edit the affected section after reloading the page.

help.redirect: Redirect to new page if someone accesses %s

children.label: Template for children
children.desc: Applies only to the same level pages which the template exists

admin_top.wiki_administrator: Only Wiki administrator can access this page
admin_top.assign_administrator: You can assign administrator from Assign administrator button in the User management page

app_setting.sitename_change: You can change Site Name which is used for header and HTML title.
app_setting.header_content: The contents entered here will be shown in the header etc.
app_setting.enable_files_except_image: Enable file upload other than image files.
app_setting.attach_enable: You can attach files other than image files if you enable this option.
app_setting.SMTP_used: If you have SMTP settings, it will be used.
app_setting.SMTP_but_AWS: If you do not have SMTP settings but AWS settings,  e-mails will be sent by SES.
app_setting.neihter_of: If you do not of neither of these, e-mails will not be sent.
app_setting.AWS_access: This is for AWS settings. If you complete AWS settings, file upload function, progile picture function etc will be enabled.
app_setting.No_SMTP_setting: If you do not have SMTP settings, e-mails will be sent via SES. You need to verify from e-mail address and production settings.
app_setting.change_setting: Caution:if you change this setting not completed, you will not be able to access files you have uploaded so far.

security_setting.The whitelist of registration permission: The whitelist of registration permission E-mail address
security_setting.common_authentication: If you set the basic authentication, common authentication is applied on the whole page.
security_setting.without_encryption: Please be noted that your ID and Password will be sent wihtout encryption.
security_setting.users_without_account: Users without account is not accessible
security_setting.restrict_emails: You can restrict registerable e-mail address.
security_setting.for_instance: For instance, if you use growi within a company, you can write
security_setting.only_those: Only those whose e-mail address including the company address can register.
security_setting.insert_single: Please insert single e-mail address per line.
security_setting.require_server_restart_change_auth: Restarting the server is required if you switch the auth mechanism.
security_setting.google_auth2_by_crowi_desc: However, this feature does not create new users, butit only makes it possible to login to the existing user who set up the association.
security_setting.server_on_passport_auth: The server is running with Passport authentication mechanism.
security_setting.server_on_crowi_auth: The server is running with official Crowi authentication mechanism.
security_setting.connect_api_manager: You can use your Google account to sign up and login after creating OAuth2 ClientId at API Manager on Google Cloud Platform
security_setting.create_project: Create Project if no projects have been created.
security_setting.change_redirect_url:
Enter https://${crowi.host}/google/callback
(where ${crowi.host} is your host name) for "Authorized redirect URIs".
security_setting.Treat username matching as identical: Automatically bind external accounts newly logged in to local accounts when %s match
security_setting.Treat username matching as identical_war: WARNING: Be aware of security because the system treats the same user as a match of %s.

ldap.server_url_detail: The LDAP URL of the directory service in the format ldap://host:port/DN or ldaps://host:port/DN.
ldap.bind_DN_manager_detail: The DN of the account that authenticates and queries the directory service
ldap.bind_DN_user_detail1: The query used to bind with the directory service.
ldap.bind_DN_user_detail2: Use {{username}} to reference the username entered in the login page.
ldap.bind_DN_password_manager_detail: The password for the Bind DN account.
ldap.bind_DN_password_user_detail: The password that is entered in the login page will be used to bind.
ldap.search_filter_detail1: The query used to locate the authenticated user.
ldap.search_filter_detail2: Use {{username}} to reference the username entered in the login page.
ldap.search_filter_detail3: If empty, the filter (uid={{username}}) is used.
ldap.username_detail: Specification of mappings for username when creating new users
ldap.name_detail: Specification of mappings for full name when creating new users
ldap.mail_detail: Specification of mappings for mail address when creating new users
ldap.group_search_base_DN_detail: The base DN from which to search for groups. If defined, also Group Search Filter must be defined for the search to work.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail1: The query used to filter for groups.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail2: Use {{dn}} to have it replaced of the found user object.
ldap.group_search_filter_detail3: (&(cn=group1)(memberUid={{dn}})) hits the groups which has cn=group1 and memberUid includes the user's uid(when Group DN Property is not changed from the default value.)
ldap.group_search_user_DN_property_detail: The property of user object to use in {{dn}} interpolation of Group Search Filter.

OAuth.change_redirect_url:
Enter %s
(where %s is your host name) for "Authorized redirect URIs".

Google.name: Google OAuth
Google.register_2: Create Project if no projects exist
Google.register_3: Create Credentials → OAuth client ID → Select "Web application"
Google.register_4: Register your OAuth App with one of Authorized redirect URIs as %s (where %s is your hostname)
Google.register_5: Copy and paste your ClientID and Client Secret above

GitHub.name: GitHub OAuth
GitHub.register_2: Register your OAuth App with "Authorization callback URL" as %s (where %s is your hostname)
GitHub.register_3: Copy and paste your ClientID and Client Secret above

markdown_setting.line_break_setting_desc: You can change line break settings.
markdown_setting.Enable Line Break desc: Treat line break in the text page as <br> in HTML
markdown_setting.Enable Line Break for comment desc: Treat line break in comment as <br> in HTML
markdown_setting.XSS_setting_desc: You can change the handling of HTML tags in markdown text.
markdown_setting.Ignore all tags desc: Stripe all HTML tags and attributes

customize_page.function_choose: You can choose Valid/Invalid of the function
customize_page.subpage_display: You can show the timeline of the subpages.
customize_page.performance_decrease: If there are many subpages, performance decreases while page loading.
customize_page.list_page_display: You can speed up list page display by invalidating.
customize_page.save_edit: Save edit tab and history tab switching in the browser and make it object for forward/back command of the browser.
customize_page.by_invalidating: By invalidating, you can make page transition as the only object for forward/back command of the browser.
customize_page.write_CSS: You can write CSS that is applied to whole system.
customize_page.reflect_change: You need to reload the page to reflect the change.
customize_page.write_java: You can write Javascript that is applied to whole system.
customize_page.attach_title_header: Add h1 section when create new page automatically
customize_page.attach_title_header_desc: Add page path to the first line as h1 section when create new page

user_management.your_own: You cannot deactivate your own account
user_management.cannot_remove: You cannot remove yourself from administrator
